RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisabl e to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICKY JOLENE cut a pressured pace along the inside through swift splits under prompting from a pair and then LONCHURA to the outside, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive to prevail. LONCHURA got bumped by PLAY FREE BIRD due to pressure from MISS OMAHA, pressed the pace of the aforementioned foe from the two path between foes early on, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, got shaken off nearing the eighth pole and ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and along second best. GRAB THE GLORY forwardly placed three wide just off the top pair, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages while just securing the show honors. PLAY FREE BIRD lunged at the start and bobbled when bumped between foes and was forced to check out conceding four lengths to the front, came under coaxing and chased three wide through the turn, angled five wide into upper stretch, showed good courage offering up a bid a furlong out then weakened in the late going. FIND YOUR JOY chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tired. WISE CONVERSATION got away to a hesitant start, then steadied soon after conceding three lengths to the front, chased just off the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, swung three wide for home and made no impact. MISS OMAHA broke in at the start bumping PLAY FREE BIRD against LONCHURA, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lonchura
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2p betw, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, ran on, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Wise Conversation
ENTRY.OWNER: Witz Frank Rodriguez Rudy R Beadnell Anthany and Beadnell Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitant, steady st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Nicky Jolene
ENTRY.OWNER: John Grossi's Racing Corp and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: cut pressured pace ins, set down 2w 1/4p, drew clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hidden Lake Farm, LLC and 3C Stables,LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Find Your Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Play Free Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge, bumped betw, checked st, chased 3w, 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Omaha
ENTRY.OWNER: Ganje Jeff and Sturgeon Bobby T
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIBERTY FLAME went to the front, showed the way with some company to her outside, shook clear while inside to the two path on the turn, responded well when put to a right-handed crop in upper stretch, maintained a clear advantage under the crop until just before the sixteenth-pole then held under a hand-ride from that point to the finish. JUST A NYQUIST lost her footing some at the start but broke with the field then was hustled, chased the pace on the outside then in the four path on the turn, pursued the winner under a drive in the stretch, swapped back to her inside late and was clear for the place. SIMPLE SUGAR broke out and brushed the gate, was urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn, remained on her inside lead under a drive in the stretch and failed to threaten while best of the rest. LA LUISA pressed the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and tired. SWEET AS SUGAR settled off the pace, was roused two to three wide on the turn, turned into the stretch under the crop and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,brshd gate,urged along,ins turn,inside lead,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Flame
ENTRY.OWNER: Begg James Bentley and Upland Flats Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,shook clear ins-2p turn,responded,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,roused 2-3path turn,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: La Luisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,chased 3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Nyquist
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing brk,hustled,chsd outside,4p turn,willingly for 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 87. Allowance Purse 95000. INNER TURF (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHILI FLAG (FR) tracked the pace along the inside, tipped briefly to the two path near the three-eighths before tucking back to the hedge when placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, tipped three then two wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole and went clear under a drive to prevail. IDEA GENERATION (IRE) bobbled at the break and was steadied when losing her lane to CHILI FLAG, tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and ran on to get up for the place honors in the last jumps. SWEET DUTCHESS established the front and spurted away on the lead two to three wide down the backstretch through sensible splits, went just off the inside through the far turn and had the field take closer order and was set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, got collared nearing the eighth pole and ran on to the finish but was nailed late for the place honors. SHE'S A MIA chased two to three wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, angled five wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. TRIPLE P had the rider apply a firm right hand grip when appearing to want make a left hand turn soon after the start, grew a bit hard to handle along the hedge out of the dog legged chut and went three wide down the backstretch, head cocked to the inside briefly before settling into stride, chased two to three wide in closest aim of the spurting away leader, took closer order on that rival and came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Triple P
ENTRY.COMMENT: firm right grip early, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Idea Generation (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, tracked ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4, ran on, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Chili Flag (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael and Kisber Michael E
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 5/16, 3-2w upper, up near 1/8, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Mia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Dutchess
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: spurted away 2-3w, 2p turn, ins 1/4, collared near 1/8, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 6F Turf CR: 80. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to r un this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Six Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUNA WARRIOR broke a bit slow and spotted the front a couple lengths, moved up then was well placed towards the front, drafted in the two path on the turn, made a bid between horses into the stretch, battled outside of the runner-up into the final furlong and edged clear under steady urging. KASIMBA angled in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside of a foe while along the rail on the turn, was asked nearing the quarter-pole then spun into the two path into upper stretch, lost the lead to the winner shortly thereafter, battled with that foe under a drive into the final furlong and was outfinished while clear for the place. LAWFUL settled towards the rear, raced inside early on the turn, shifted three then four wide while gaining late on that bend, rallied to make a five wide bid at the quarter-pole, battled outside of the top two in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened but was clear for the show. FIRE BARON dropped well behind the rest of the field, saved ground on the turn, came out into upper stretch and failed to threaten. THATSMYBOXER tracked the pace on the outside,dropped back two to three wide early on the turn, was carried four wide near the five-sixteenths then was taken in hand off heels, dropped back to the two path outside the quarter-pole then moved to the rail into the stretch and had nothing left. BILL OF RIGHTS was hustled from the start, moved out then advanced to press the pace on the outside, tossed his head some inside the five-eighths, vied in the three path on the turn, dropped back between horses in upper stretch and tired. VESELSKY settled off the pace, was asked while two to three wide early on the turn, moved to four wide later on that bend then was carried five wide, dropped back while remaining on his inside lead in upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Baron
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind, inside turn, came out 1/4, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bill of Rights
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd out,gain,press outside,toss head4-1/2,3p turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lawful
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,gained ins-4path turn,bid5p1/4,drop back1/8,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Kasimba
ENTRY.OWNER: Twin Sports Racing and Gap View Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,pace,ins turn,headed3/16,outfinished,clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Veselsky
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,ask turn,2-5path,inside lead upper stretch,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,mvd up,well placed,2p turn,bid1/4,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Thatsmyboxer
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,dropped back 2-4path turn,off heels,rail1/4,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAUL coaxed from the gate, raced three wide in aim of the leader advancing to prompt that rival from the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three then two wide straightened away into upper stretch taking command, came in at the three-sixteenths, then drifted out under a left handed crop while edging clear to the finish kept to task. RIDGEWOOD RUNNER coaxed from the start, cut a pressured pace from the two path under coaxing from the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch under challenge and was headed for command straightened away, tipped off the inside as the aforementioned foe came in towards the rail in front, ran on willingly coming outwards towards the finish following the clear out as he drifted in front while along well clear of the rest and second best. DEVIL'S PLAYGROUND was away to a hesitant start when getting away a beat slow, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors. FALFURRIAS coaxed from the start, chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the stretch. FIRST TRUMPET hustled from the gate, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. GAME MISCONDUCT stumbled at the start and broke on top despite it, chased along the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, continued along the inside into upper stretch and tired. DANGEROUS DRIVER coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. CHARLIE TOUGH coaxed from the start, chased in the overland route five to six wide throughout under urging from midway on the turn and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Game Misconduct
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dangerous Driver
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: First Trumpet
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgewood Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pressured pace 2p, ins 1/4, headed, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Playground
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitant st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Haul
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and St Elias Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3w in aim, coaxed 5/16, 3-2w uppr, up, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Falfurrias
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie Tough
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-6w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, never menaced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 86. Waiver Claiming Purse 41000. INNER TURF (UP TO $7,134 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPETTRO went to the front in the two path on the first turn, was well rated while setting the pace through slow fractions, controlled the action while inside on the far turn, extended the advantage when set down into upper stretch, responded well under the crop in the drive and held under strong urging. GHOSTLYPRINCE was taken under a tight hold on the first turn then rated just off the pace on the inside, drafted behind the leader on the far turn, was asked in the two path into the stretch, pursued the winner into the final sixteenth and gained with good courage late but missed while clear for the place. MIGHTY ATLAS was taken under a snug hold while dropping from the two path to the rail on the first turn, raced off the pace under restraint, saved ground on the far turn, was put to a drive in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick while up for the show. GENERAL'S DUTY came outward after the start, went four wide around the opening bend, was reserved on the outside but with cover, lost the benefit of cover inside the five-eighths pole, tucked into the two path while behind horses for the run around the far turn, was roused at the quarter-pole and lacked the needed response. NO REGARD was put under tight restraint in the three path on the first turn, raced off the pace under reserve, was let out in the three path on the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and also lacked the needed response. PARATUS was reserved at the rear in the two to three path, came four wide into the stretch then quickly moved further out and failed to threaten. FAST GORDON ducked out at the start, went four wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was given his cue in the two path on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch and came up empty. MOST WANTED MAN came outward after the start and was slow into stride, was caught five wide on the first turn, settled on the outside without the benefit of cover, was asked in the four path on the far turn then came five wide into the stretch and failed to rally. STRONG LIGHT was hustled from the gate then taken up after the start, checked while eager in the three to four path on the first turn, tugged rankly on the bit early on the backstretch, went around the far turn in the five path, spun six wide into the stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostlyprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,rated inside,asked 2path1/4,chased,good courage,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Spettro
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,well rated,ins2nd,asked1/4,extended lead3/16,held drvng

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Off The Hook LLC, Gumpster Stable & Ghostzapper Syndicate

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Atlas
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold 2p-ins1st,rated,ins2nd,asked1/4,chased,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: tkn up after brk,tkn up bad 1st turn,rank,3-5wide,6w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: No Regard
ENTRY.OWNER: That's Amore Stable Hill Nakia R Smothers Stewart and Transfiguration Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,3p1st,rated,let out 3w2nd,4w1/4,chased,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Paratus
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2p1st,reserved,2-3p2nd,4w1/4,mvd out 3/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: General's Duty
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out after brk,4w1st,reserved,2p2nd,ask1/4,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Most Wanted Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out,slw to stride,5w1st,settled outside,4w2nd,5w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Gordon
ENTRY.OWNER: Lady Sheila Stable Iris Smith Stable Anderson Janet and Anderson Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out brk,4w1st,stlkd outside,ask2p2nd,3p1/4,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'MHAVINGAMOMENT five paths off the inside down the backstretch in pursuit from just off the pace, tucked three wide through the turn and advanced from the seven-sixteenths to stack outside the top pair three furlongs from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and issued a challenge for the front swinging four wide into upper stretch, took over command with three-sixteenths to go and edged clear under a drive to the finish. FANCY FELINE chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. MAJESTIC RETURN prompted the pace of MISS STONES from the outside four then three wide before tucking to the two path through the turn, steadily gained on that rival to take over just inside the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch under threat, dug in and was collared with three-sixteenths to run and kept on well clear of the rest to preserve the show honors. TOWERING GAZE four paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. TOSCONOVA BEAUTY coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside down the backstretch before tipping two then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing with seven-sixteenths to run, swung two to three wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. DISRUPTION chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun three wide into upper stretch and tired. YOU'RE MY GIRL coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, got coaxed along with seven-sixteenths to go, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. MISS STONES hustled from the gate, showed the way in hand three then two wide down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn under pressure to the outside, came under coaxing at he three-eighths, yielded the front just inside the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Stones
ENTRY.OWNER: Valente Roddy J Bilinski Darlene and Alfred Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, in hand 3-2w, ins turn, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Tosconova Beauty
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 3w 7/16, 2-3w upper, by tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Hidden Brook Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed along ins 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Return
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 4-3w, 2p turn, up ins 5/16, 3w upper, collared, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Disruption
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Towering Gaze
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 7/16, 2-3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: I'mhavingamoment
ENTRY.OWNER: Dream Maker Racing and Lunsford Bruce
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w early, 3w turn, advanced 7/16, 4w uppr, up 3/16, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mia Gallo, Mary Kopley, Michael Newton& Elizabeth Weese

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Feline
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, mild kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Sixteenth on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STELLA MARS settled off the pace, went around most of the turn in the two path, was roused between horses coming to the five-sixteenths then shifted three wide, swung six wide into the stretch, rallied on the clear leader, moved in while gaining into the final furlong and closed well to win going away. DONTMESSWITHTESS settled under some urging, rallied four then three wide on the turn, took the lead outside the quarter-pole then kicked clear, drifted out inside the three-sixteenths, had her lead diminish into the final furlong, led to the sixteenth-pole and was overtaken while well clear for the place. EXCEPT TEMPTATION broke awkwardly then brushed with a foe and was taken up, settled near the rear, went three wide for most of the turn then shifted five wide, came seven wide into the stretch and earned the show while no match for the top two. CUMBERLAND FALLS was hustled from the gate, settled on the inside, moved off the rail while roused near the five-sixteenths, was driven five wide into the stretch and came up empty. BRISKY FROLIC moved to the lead entering the main course then went clear, showed the way down the backstretch, vied in the two path with extra left-rein pressure on the turn, lost the advantage outside the quarter-pole, floated four wide into the stretch and tired. MORE MANGO settled towards the rear, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. UP HER SLEEVE settled towards the front, saved ground while roused on the turn and failed to respond. REDZILLA lugged out significantly under heavy left-rein pressure outside the seven-eighths pole, settled on the outside, dropped back four then five wide under urging on the turn and faltered. ALWAYS LAUGHING settled on the outside, moved in late on the backstretch, went two then three wide on the turn and also faltered. KANNON FIRE brushed with a rival at the start then was hustled, settled off the pace, dropped back three then four wide on the turn, came out into the stretch and also faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Cumberland Falls
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled,ins-2path turn,swung 5w1/4,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Stella Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,2-3path turn,ask btwn5/16,6w1/4,rallied,mvd in1/8,up

ENTRY.NAME: More Mango
ENTRY.OWNER: Ferraro James W Barbati Kenneth B and Cespuglio Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, inside turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Redzilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: lugged out 7/8,outside,drop back 4-5w 2nd turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Up Her Sleeve
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled towards front, inside turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Kannon Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,hustled,settled,3-4w turn,came out1/4,falter,eased,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: Except Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward brk,tkn up,well back,3-5w turn,7w1/4,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Brisky Frolic
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd to lead,clear7/8,2p turn,headed outside1/4,4p,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Always Laughing
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,moved in 5/8,2-3path turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Dontmesswithtess
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Staudacher David
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,rallied 4-3w turn,lead1/4,clear,drift out ins3/16,overtkn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 9 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 35000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOLD HONOR chased along the inside down the backstretch before tipping out four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, took over the front with three-sixteenths to go and edged clear under a drive kept to task. CHESS SPECTACULAR coaxed from the gate, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. GRAND AGAIN showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing near the five-sixteenths and shook away, swung three wide into upper stretch under lone threat, got collared with three-sixteenths to go, ran on to the finish to preserve the show honors well clear of the rest. ERIDROMOS coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. EQUALIZER coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch offering up a bid, then flattened out in the final furlong and was reported to have bled. SOMAMA BEACH stumbled at the start, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued three to four wide into upper stretch and tired. BRASS MONKEY chased five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued five wide for home, tired. RUNAWAY ROAD chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. ONE FOR MY BROTHER took the overland route chasing six paths off the inside down the backstretch and through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went eight wide at the head of the stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, shook away, 3w upper, caught, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Somama Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Chess Spectacular
ENTRY.OWNER: Four Corners Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Honor
